alert.note: Alert for Northwest Raleigh; Southeast Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CENTRAL RALEIGH COUNTY... At 448 PM EDT, heavier snow showers were located along a line from Glen Daniel east to Bradley, moving southeast at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Beckley, Mabscott, Crab Orchard, Dry Creek, Macarthur, Bradley, Shady Spring, Prosperity, Beaver, Daniels, Stanaford and Piney View. This includes the following highways... West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 30 and 52. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 120 and 136. Route 19 between mile markers 1 and 3. Heavier snow showers will lead to briefly reduced visibilities under a quarter of a mile in some locations. Please slow down and allow for plenty of stopping distance, particularly if on the interstate.
